reference.title: cxxAPIMap
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxAPIMap> element provides the name of the C++ API Reference and all the elements necessary to describe the package, or set of packages, and its components.

section.title: Description
section.p: The containing element for a map is the <cxxAPIMap> element. <cxxAPIMap> requires the title and id attributes.
<cxxAPIMap> can also contain any number of the elements <cxxFileRef>, <cxxClassRef>, <cxxStructRef> and <cxxUnionRef> to add references to topics.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxAPIMap id="amap" title="AMap"> <cxxFileRef href="afile.xml" navtitle="afile.h" /> <cxxClassRef href="aclass.xml" navtitle="AClass" /> <cxxStructRef href="astruct.xml" navtitle="AClass::AStruct" /> <cxxUnionRef href="aunion.xml" navtitle="AClass::AUnion" /> <cxxNamespaceRef href="anamespace.xml" navtitle="AClass::ANamespace" /> </cxxAPIMap>
